mapper.update: UPDATE cloud_shelf set status = #{status} WHERE number = (select cloud_shelf_number from cloud_shelf_detail where operating_position_id =#{operatingPositionId})
mapper.select: select product_name from product where product_number in (select product_number from operating_position_bind_product where operating_position_id = (select operating_position_id from shelf_templates where id = (select shelf_templates_number from cloud_shelf where number = #{cloudShelfNumber}) and shelf_category_id = #{shelfCategoryId}));

select Content_name from content where content_number in (select CONTENT_number from operating_position_bind where OPERATING_POSITION_ID =( select OPERATING_POSITION_ID from CLOUD_SHELF_DETAIL where CLOUD_SHELF_NUMBER = (select num from CLOUD_SHELF where num =#{cloudShelfNumber}) and SHELF_CATEGORY_ID = #{shelfCategoryId}))

SELECT DISTINCT d.*, s.NAME AS cloud_shelf_name FROM cloud_shelf_detail d, cloud_shelf s, operating_position_bind o WHERE d.CLOUD_SHELF_NUMBER = s.NUM AND d.OPERATING_POSITION_ID = o.operating_position_id AND o.product_number LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productId}), '%')
